snippet: The publishing campaign, which will include a new essay collection, is aimed at introducing Norman Mailer’s work to a younger generation of readers.
abstract: Random House is embarking on publishing campaign to introduce work of Norman Mailer to younger generations of readers, beginning with a new essay collection of his writings.
lead_paragraph: The publishing campaign, which will include a new essay collection, is aimed at introducing Norman Mailer’s work to a younger generation of readers.

headline.main: Random House Plans Release of Norman Mailer Books
